General Knowledge.question: The speed of light is faster than the speed of sound.
There are more than seven continents in the world.
The human heart has five chambers.
Albert Einstein developed the theory of relativity.

Movies.question: The movie 'The Shawshank Redemption' was released in 1984.
Tom Hanks won an Oscar for his role in 'Forrest Gump'.
The 'Lord of the Rings' trilogy consists of four movies.
Stanley Kubrick directed the movie '2001: A Space Odyssey'.
The first 'Star Wars' movie was released in 1999.

Music.question: The Beatles were an English rock band.
Elvis Presley is known as the 'King of Rock and Roll'.
Beethoven was completely deaf when he wrote some of his most famous pieces.
The saxophone is a woodwind instrument.

Television.question: The first season of 'The Simpsons' aired in 1989.
The TV show 'Seinfeld' is often described as 'a show about nothing'.
'The Sopranos' is set in New York City.
The longest-running American TV show is a soap opera.
Sherlock Holmes is a fictional character created by J.K. Rowling.

Video Games.question: The original PlayStation was released in 1994.
Mario is the main character in the 'Halo' franchise.
The first Grand Theft Auto game had a top-down perspective.
The Nintendo Wii outsold the Sony PlayStation 3.
The first commercial video game was called 'Pong'.
